body_html: Actually, for your particular case, can't you instead write a new batch sampler that returns a tuple with a single list inside, and the list contains the indices to pass to tensordataset ? I think we don't need to modify anything in the current codebase, nor expose a new functionality

body: Actually, for your particular case, can't you instead write a new batch sampler that returns a tuple with a single list inside, and the list contains the indices to pass to tensordataset ? I think we don't need to modify anything in the current codebase, nor expose a new functionality
